text: Deadline - U.S.A. is a 1952 American crime drama movie directed by Richard Brooks and starring Humphrey Bogart, Ethel Barrymore, Kim Hunter, Ed Begley, Warren Stevens, Martin Gabel, James Dean, Fay Baker. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1952 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Brooks
title: Deadline - U.S.A.
